short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stuck on today's Wordle? Reveal a hidden letter in just one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Most Wordle solvers lists out all possible solutions. This takes the fun out of solving since you already see the solution. This extension takes a different approach by revealing one letter in the solution at a time. This helps you to solve the Wordle using the extra hint.
